review_title: 4 Weeks later and i cant fault it

one_reviews_text: So much fun and such a great experience. My wife said she "can't believe something like this even exists" which sums it up pretty well. Graphics are good, not amazing, but the freedom to move around anywhere helps create such an immersive experience.The only downside is I bought it for myself and my friends and wife are hogging it!

The Oculus Quest is the first VR device for me to have a hands-on experience. The headset fits comfortably and the straps can be adjusted to your liking. Audio speakers are pretty decent, although you have the option to use third-party ear buds. Some people have complained about the weight issue in the front but I have no problems whatsoever. The touch controllers feel grippy and has wrist straps so you don't have to worry about dropping them. Battery cover is also magnetized which I find it to be neat and convenient for quick access. There are a plethora of games in the Oculus store and I'm in love with Beat Saber! This device is very portable and family friendly because there's no cable involved and the setup is quick and easy. Oculus released their 'Oculus Link' cable which allows you to connect to your PC. An added bonus twice the fun!I highly recommend the Oculus Quest as it is priced lower than other devices, and it allows one to experience VR in a more convenient way without the cables and motion sensors hassle that are involved with other VR devices. You'll have a ton of fun whether by yourself or with family and friends! I look forward to the future of VR technology.

Oculus has brought a new immersive experience in the way we consume content. Once you wear these headsets you'll be teleported to a new world where time will stand still. It's unlike any other device I've tried so far. Try it guys. Thank me later :)

My only complaint about this headset is that the minimalist exterior design is so sleek they actually hid the important setup buttons (like how to power it on for the first time). I also ran into a slight issue updating the firmware on both controllers during the initial setup -- for some reason it "forget" the controller during the update and setup, and the controller was needed to continue. A quick reset fixed the issue and then I was back in business.Once everything was set up, the rest was amazing. We tried playing around in the tutorial, which by itself was enough to blow our minds -- the graphic quality is incredible considering this thing is running on a snapdragon. I guess my expectations were pretty low, but everything was crisp, colourful, and extremely detailed.After completing the tutorial we decided to grab Vader: Immortal, Episode 1 and that really was the icing on the cake. Unlike the tutorial, which goes for a more animated approach, Vader: Immortal made you feel like you were a character in the movie. The first time Darth Vader approaches you in the game you'll find yourself breathless... it really is cinematic quality VR.I have a little Plex server set up as well... to my surprise, I figured up the pre-installed movie system and started watching *cough* home videos on a screen the equivalent size of an Imax. The quality on the movie was very crisp... I was a little worried it might be a little gimmicky. It's probably the equivalent of watching a 1080p movie on a 72" screen in real life.The next thing we tried was some of the free YouTube 360 videos. Within a minute I was on stage watching Ed Roland (Collective Soul) from 2 feet away, followed by some Switchfoot, and about a dozen other bands. We decided to change gears and went for some underwater videos swimming with sharks. The 6 degrees of freedom is crazy in these videos.Finally, in real life I get motion sick as a passenger in a vehicle. I was worried that the Quest's 72Hz refresh rate would make the whole thing unplayable. To date, there has only been one video I played that made me feel a bit queezy and I think it was something to do with how the video was created. Even the fast motion stuff in games hasn't bothered me -- but, I haven't spent more than 30-45 minutes a time playing (because everyone in the family is fighting to play around with it).Overall, this felt like an "on the fence" purchase but I have zero regrets. It was our family's first VR purchase... considering its just marginally more expensive than a console, and given the gaming, movie, and educational content, I would say you get far better bang for your buck with this thing than a console.

No se por donde empezar... el oculus QUEST es un producto que cambió mi perspectiva el VR. Los seis grados de libertad (prácticamente es que no se necesitan cables, ni una gaming PC) además de lo intuitivos que son los controles me dejaron bocabierto.Adicional a que de por sí los controles ya eran excelentes, ahora también están desarrollando la opción para que con tus propias manos puedas jugar. Los juegos son baratos a comparación de los de otras consolas (switch, xbox, ps4) ya que oscilan entre los 10 y 30 dls.Es una excelente consola y el grado de inmersión que tiene es brutal. Sin lugar a dudas la mejor compra que pude haber hecho y más por el precio que fue alrededor de 9,000 mxn por la versión de 64 gb.Honestamente no se ocupan más gb si no piensas descargar películas, ya que actualmente tengo instalados alrededor de 25 juegos y aún tiene bastante espacio.Lo recomiendo ampliamente.
review_title: El mejor producto de VR que puedes comprar actualmente

They ask " it's all in there!?"It's so immersive!, you feel like your there!Superhot is such an amazing experience!My only complaint is that the casting to my phone or iPad is not working all the time, actually most of the time. I've got it working 2 twice. But every time I had people over to play it, it never worked.So no one could see what someone is doing while playing.So that's a bummer so far, hopefully this will be fixed in future updates.

Soy una persona que crecio sin videojuegos y nunca tuve la curiosidad de comprar consolas. Un dia vi un video de Beat Saber y quise saber mas al respecto. El hecho de jugar en realidad virtual me parecio muy atractivo. Lamentablemente, en ese entonces, 2017, los visores de realidad virtual eran muy costosos y privativos a tener computadoras con tarjeta de video potente.Supe del Quest en enero 2020 y en cuanto supe que era una opcion portable, me decidi a comprarlo para probar Beat Saber. El precio me parecio elevado ($9000 en ese momento) pero aun asi decidi comprarlo. Aun con ese precio, es una oferta accesible, tras comparar con otros visores de realidad virtual. En muchas reseñas se critican los graficos del visor, pero sinceramente no experimente ningun detrimento en la calidad de los graficos ni afecta en la inmersion. La bateria del visor dura aproximadamente 2 horas. Unas baterias recargables para los controles duran una semana y media jugando entre 1.5 y 2 horas diarias.La mejor compra que he hecho en mucho tiempo. Vale cada centavo que he pagado.
review_title: La mejor inversion en juegos que he hecho en mucho tiempo

one_reviews_text: Excelente desde la caja. El olor a nuevo es exquisito. Viene muy bien protegido todo y los lentes impresionantes en su estructura y en la experiencia de realidad virtual. MeQuedé impresionado con la sensación, fue muy impresionante. Para que los demás vean tus jugadas en la tv mientras juegas con los visores es necesario comprar un dispositivo chromecast 3 o posterior para que todos disfruten de las partidas a la vez que uno juega. Después de jugar lo pongo a cargar en seguida pues la pila no dura mucho. En general estoy muy contento con esta compra y muy sorprendido. Lo recomiendo ampliamente.

Excelente visor de VR standalone 6DOF, calidad gráfica muy aceptable, lentes mejorados respecto a los que usaron en Rift CV1, sonido decente y con posibilidad de usar tus propios audífonos, tracking muy bien desarrollado, mandos Touch que son los mejores del mercado y por último, el ecosistema de Oculus.Contras:- Se siente algo pesado para experiencias largas, pero te acostumbras con el uso cotidiano.- Duración de la batería corta, pero puedes usar batería externa.- Sonido que sale desde la banda lateral que puede molestar a otras personas en la habitación, pero se puede optar por el uso de audífonos propios.Super recomendado para iniciarse en la VR o para quiénes no tengan un PC potente.
review_title: Super recomendado para iniciarse en la VR!!!

one_reviews_text: I love the system.  It is fast, clear and flexible.Unfortunately one of my controllers died after less than a month (no physical damage) and Oculus support is slow to respond and requires up to 12 business days when they finally get around to sending me a shipping label (they are being evasive).  They are currently "looking into this further";  it is simply defective and they are being slow and evasive.  I suspect they are either short on parts or the support rep is being useless but required to respond with something to meet an SLA.  This is crap.  I want my product fixed and the support is useless.  It has been a week since I got any useful reply.If your unit has any issue in the first month I recommend returning it rather than attempting to deal with oculus support.

I would give this a 5 star review - the games are fun, there's lots of them, and the 2 hour battery life is more than enough because you actually get tired playing. BUT you only get one account, one avatar, one user, per headset. This is beyond disappointing. If I play a bunch of levels and then my husband wants to play, he has to start the game where I left off. I played halfway through the Vader Immortal game, then all he could do is chapter select or watch from where I was. There is no way to add a second oculus account and there is no way to add a second avatar within an account. The only way you can save games separately is to make two oculus accounts, buy each game twice, and then factory reset the headset and reload the account every time you switch users.
review_title: Not for families - only one user per headset

one_reviews_text: This product is Totally Amazing! I researched it lots & talked to a few people prior to ordering. I waited for it to arrive with great anticipation. Once I put it on for the first time I was totally blown away. All of my expectations were met and surpassed at that moment. I am still new to using it so I have lots more to learn. Looking forward to all of the new experiences which lie ahead!
review_title: Amazing Product.! The Future has arrived!

one_reviews_text: Having used an HTC Vive, and a Rift 1, I can say I'm VERY happy with the Quest.  Biggest factor is convenience.  No sensors to set up, no software to install, convenience of purchasing Apps from the App store but NOT a walled garden (can side load Apps from elsewhere).  I use it in 4 rooms, and it remembers my guardians in each room.  Just put the headset on and go.The quality is not as high as a headset connected to a $4k gaming machine, but I don't really notice the difference, and you can connect to a gaming PC if you want.Things don't like.Face pad is rough on my skin (will likely buy an aftermarket pad).Very inconvenient watching media, with the volume on the headset, and needing to fumble for a controller to ff/rewind/pause.  Screen color balance is poor.-1 star because I don't trust Facebook.

Creo que es un excelente producto, se nota mucho la calidad de los materiales, diseño y hasta el empaque. Lamentablemente creo que por la crisis, desabasto, aumento del dolar, se ha hecho dificil conseguirlo al precio justo, y a veces la relacion costco-beneficio podria no ser tan buena dependiendo a cuanto lo consiguen.Para los que nunca han usado un headset de VR es una experiencia impresionante, desde los tutoriales hasta los videos que existen en la plataforma, son bastante inmersivos y es otro tipo de sensacion que no se compara con las consolas tradicionales. Los juegos podrian ser sencillos, no tan largos, ni demandantes graficamente, pero eso no le quita puntos por que estas consolas apenas estan empezando. Aun asi hay otros headsets (Valve Index) que pueden lograr este tipo de graficos, solamente que son de un costo mucho mayor y se requiere una computadora con ciertos requerimientos.Para los que estan pensando comprarlo y usar un cable USB C (Link) para jugar juegos de computadora, mejor hagan su investigacion y configuren Virtual Desktop, necesitan un modem que soporte la banda de 5GHz, y obviamente una computadora "gamer", pero van a tener menos problemas que usando el cable (aun esta en beta), aparte de que van a poder seguir jugando wireless. Otro punto importante es que si hacen eso, van a poder comprar juegos de Steam, que son mas baratos que en la tienda de Oculus.

Hands-down, the future of gaming. You don’t play games with this thing, you engage in experiences. The possibilities are unlimited. Keep in mind, graphically and functionally, this unit isn’t the best in any individual category, but is truly the best overall experience. And the price point is unheard of, compared to buying a next gen console on arrival. This is, what the NES did for home gaming. The tech and our ability to adapt it for VR experiences is still in its infancy. For any of its drawbacks, you keep that in mind. This is the absolute tip of the spear in what will be a revolution in how we play games, but more uniquely, how we will interact with virtual space for the next generation.Do yourself a favour and buy one. Then share it with your friends.Gamers will find it very intuitive, non-gamers will need someone familiar with VR to help them acclimatize to the control aspects.100% wireless.100% enjoyable.
review_title: It’s the future of digital interaction.

one_reviews_text: I received a Faulty left controller and after 3 weeks and over 20 emails to oculus support asking for some seriously outrages proof of the product not working ie uploading proof to a Utube channelThey have now stopped replying to my email and left me with no choice but to purchase another controllerIt was by far the worst customer service experience I have had to go through and left me out of pocket
review_date: 2020年9月18日 在澳大利亚审核

one_reviews_text: Great buy for first vr headset I'd recommend to anyone who wants to get into vr it's a great way to dip your toe in without slapping 1100 pulse dollars if you already have a stong PC than this headset works pretty much flawlessly with both steam link and wirless via virtual desktop the only problem I have is it's gets  pretty toasty and the cheep head strap is great for taking it to gatherings and such but pretty terrible for supporting an all in one vr headset I'd recommend getting a battery bank to help Anker the the weight of the headset and it'd give you more battery
review_title: Great first step or cheepest PC vr headset 6th degrees of freedom

one_reviews_text: I really like the Quest and I'm impressed with every aspect of it. It's design quality is seriously impressive and the experience of using it is phenomenal. While not cheap, it's a way better deal than most other VR systems and it's self-contained. It's a lot of fun.

Excelente headset de VR la posibilidad de jugar de forma inalámbrica es genial y con occulus link puedes jugar en la PC los mejores juegos de VR especialmente el Half Life Alyx que es la mejor experiencia en videojuegos y realidad virtual hasta el momento. Después de jugar al Half Life Alyx ya no querrás jugar de la forma anticuada, los gráficos lucen espectaculares y además el contenido para adultos en VR es una experiencia inolvidable que paga por sí solo el headset.Recomendado ampliamente lo único malo del Quest es que es pesado y muy incómodo para usar sobre todo comparado con el Rift S pero comprando los accesorios para hacer el "Frankenquest" queda espectacular y súper cómodo de usar con el mejor sonido, Los puedes conseguir aquí mismo en Amazon.Vale la pena comprarlo para tener Mobilidad y PC VR pero considera hacer el Frankenquest y te darás cuenta que hasta la fecha tendrás el mejor headset con el mejor confort y sonido del mercado hasta el momento.
review_title: Gran Headset y experiencia inolvidable en VR

one_reviews_text: I love my new Quest one of the only main disadvantages is lots of my previous apps off my gear VR are not compatible with the Quest and seems I'm expected to re purchase them for the Quest and their store is limited in what the Gear VR store had. They are so strick on what they allow in the store even with SideQuest its limited however the experience is way more quality and immersive. I haven't tried pc link or remote desktop due to having a outdated PC. This Headset is way more professional then the Gear VR.

Para aquellos que recuerdan esa primera vez que se sentaron frente a un televisor para quedar impresionados con una consola de videojuegos, atari nintendo etc... es la misma sensación al probar esta oferta de VR.Con el Oculus quest por fin se siente que la tecnología llego a un punto que se disfruta y apantalla.Los juegos son super inmersivos y corren perfectamenteSuper recomendable, si lo has estado pensando y esperando ahora es cuando! =)

You will find better quality VR gear but this one has no wires or towers - it makes room scale that much more immersive when you don't have to think about a tether. Oculus Quest feels like a VR gaming console mixed with a VR version of your Android smartphone. The dashboard is very fun and snappy to "shoot at" with the controllers. It's very immersive.Setup using the phone was quick and easy. I made an Oculus account and skipped linking it to Facebook because I don't use it. It also let me skip the credit card info which is good because I'm not ready to buy anything else just yet. Then the phone put the headset into update mode and it was done minutes later. The Quest came pre-loaded with quite a few demos to try which was nice. None of the games gave me motion sickness, but the joystick movement and buggy looking menu system in Rec Room eventually got to me. I had to take the headset off for a bit to settle the stomach before jumping back in.The only major con I have been experiencing is with the lenses, apparently the smudgey look in them is normal so I have accepted it as a first-gen limitation of the manufacturing process, it's not usually that noticeable but it's annoying when it is. The headset makes you see things as though they are further away so I had to use contact lenses as a near-sighted person. The headset has enough room for my small rectangle glasses as well but big round glasses don't fit. There is definitely a screen door effect but it's also not very noticeable while you are moving around gaming. Being able to watch TV in VR is very cool and useful but the visual experience is degraded because of the lenses and the screen door effect and in no way compares to regular TV quality. Making the VR TV enormous helps though and laying down and watching on the ceiling is crazy.Overall I have had a ton of fun and, despite its flaws, it feels well worth the price for entry VR. I wasn't sure if this would be a keep or a return since VR is still so early but I'm totally hooked now.

I used Windows mixed reality since 2018. However, the experience was ok as my set has no manual IPD thus the experience is not good as the software IPD cant meet the setting I need. Focus is always a challenge. My brother bought the Quest and I was shocked how good the visual was compared to my WMR set. Despite the lower resolution compare to the WMR, the manual IPD adjustment make a night and day difference to my experience. The WMR has reliability issue, I have the headset and controller replaced once during the warranty. I hope the Quest is more reliable. Other than that the Quest is front heavy which I have to use counter weight. The option to use it without wire is also a big plus. I am very impressed with the Quest and am anticipating the Quest 2 which should be even better. (update after 3 months) the right controller suddenly loss the haptic feedback. After taking all the suggested steps of Re-pairing, resetting quest to factory default, the motor still refuse to move. I thought oculus should do better than WMR as this is my 2nd experience of failed controller with VR.
review_title: A clear step up from the Window but.. s Mixed Reality Headset

one_reviews_text: This VR is awesome, watching gameplay videos on Youtube or anywhere else does not give it justice.. You have to try it to experience it, trust me, this is one of the most impressive tech I have tried so far! I get really bad motion sickness and only found a few games that made me feel sick but most of them I didn't get motion sickness at all(beat sabre, Pistol whip, Star wars episode 1 and 2, National Geographic) Those games are awesome and can't wait to purchase more games! You won't regret the purchase if you do buy.
review_title: Awesome peice of tech, New way of gaming(first time with VR) :)

one_reviews_text: The oculus quest is the best piece of hardware I ha e ever owned. Better than any console, better than my laptop. This thing sucks you into the digital world like you wouldn't believe. The immersion is insane. Screen door effect is almost unnoticable. In terms of detail and screen quality, this far surpasses the HTC vive. The one and only flaw I've noticed is that the nose area has a small amount of light leakage, but it is almost impossible to tell once you're in a game.
review_title: The best VR headset I've ever owned

one_reviews_text: Overall I have no problems with the Oculus Quest except when I plug in the left ear bud, it seems to not work all the time, It will cut in and out, It is not the ear bud but the unit, If you press the plug and slightly push it forward it will work again, My brothers unit has the same issue. Other than that I highly recommend it to all.It can get pricey and they need to create more games. But its great...
review_title: Its different and fun experience in video games!

one_reviews_text: I was hesitating between giving it 4 or 5 stars.Pros :- wireless- remembers barriers so you don't have to redo them constantly- double tap to see your surroundings is really nice- having 2 headphone plugs is really handyCons :- I start getting a headache after playing a while because it is really heavy- weirdly enough I find it hard to know which controller goes in which hand and I always mess up. They are kinda oddly shaped and they weight distribution isn't natural- To be able to play my steam games wirelessly I had to install so many programs and apps and pay 25$ for virtual desktop, kinda complicated for no reason... I know they want you to buy from their store but I had an HTC vive before and already had bought a bunch of games...
review_title: Prefer it over the HTC Vive

one_reviews_text: My 8 year old daughter took the Quest from me yesterday moments after setting up the system.  She played with it for about 4 hours strait in various apps and games.  Then I have been playing a few games as well into the evening,  Its simply amazing walking around in game and feeling like I am really there....only to just be walking around in my living room.  I was so impressed I ordered a computer and Rift just to have a second unit and more options.
review_title: Simply Outstanding technology.  Rarely am i ever so impressed with something new

one_reviews_text: When I visiting my son in May he had the older version with cameras on stands lots of set up and more.  I fell in love with VR, but not the setup. When he let me know they now had the Oculus Quest which was literally just a headset and hand controls that did the same thing, I purchased it immediately. Madly in love with the game called Beat Saber and have played it once or twice a day since buying this unit.  It's amazing. A few glitches occasionally but nothing important. I highly recommend this set.
review_title: Best thing I've bought in the last decade.

one_reviews_text: Hacia tiempo queria adquirir un headset de vr, y la vdd excedio las expectativas, es ligero, registra muy bien el movimiento de los brazos, tiene una libreria de juegos muy amplia ( ahora aun mas desde que estan cn el beta de oculus link para pider jugarlo cn una pc gamer ) vale cada peso que pague por el, el tiempp de juego varia alrededor de las dos horas, lo cual al principio esta bien en lo que acostumbras la vista, despues podria parecer corto sobretodo si compartes el juego cn alguien mas pero se arregla cn un battery pack. Saludos!

I spent a few months trying to decide whether to purchase the Oculus Rift S or the new Quest.  I was initially worried about the quality of the games, running on a mobile processor vs a full pc desktop with a powerful graphics card, but after watching reviews, and then discovering the possibility of being able to stream VR games from my gaming PC, I decided to bite the bullet and purchase the Quest.  A couple of things immediately won me over:1) No cables and 360 degree tracking.  This, in itself, is amazing and a game changer.  Once you try it, it’s really really hard to go back.2) The portability.  I travel a lot for work and I can take this thing with me anywhere.  That’s awesome.The game library is somewhat limited, but games are coming out all the time and there are quite a few great options in the store.  Beat Saber is fantastic, and there are a number of really fun and immersive games that will blow you away.If I have any complaints they would be the following:1) The unit is somewhat heavy sitting on your face.  It’s not too bad, but long sessions you may notice it.2) Battery life - I get about 2 hours right now, which is actually fine as I usually only play for about 30mins to an 1hr each evening so it’s enough for me, but may be a pain for those who like longer sessions (FYI - you can use a battery pack and mount it on the back for extra play time should you desire, there’s a couple guides on the net that explain how to do this).3) Audio.  It has these built in speakers that fire down towards your ears and, while it works quite well, you’ll probably want to get your one earphones to use instead.  A nice feature is that Oculus provide two external headphone jacks on either side of the headset, and they work great.  But it’s something to note.  Also, if you do use the built in ones, everyone will hear what you are playing.All in all I absolutely love this device and am thrilled with it.  I cannot wait to see where this technology goes, the possibilities are endless and I really believe this is the future of VR.
review_title: Oculus Quest is a game changer for VR.  Seriously.

one_reviews_text: Awesome! I love the feeling of being put into a game, and it's wireless! I had an HTC Vive (another virtual reality headset) and it hooked up to my computer, and I kept tripping on the cord! With this, I can move around with ease!The only downside is that there aren't as many games as the other headsets but they are working on making that available. I also heard you can hook it up to your pc for better graphics and the other games!

So I have a valve index which I thought would be the best of the best and I'm alot of cases, it is. But this headset is what I feel is the most innovative of all. Having full 6 degrees of freedom with PC quality games in an all-in-one headset is just astonishing. I was actually very skeptical of the inside out tracking but a buddy got this headset and the first time I tried it I knew this was a special product. Honestly people if you have never experienced vr before or have but want something to bring with and think this might just be a cheap rip off of vr, it's not.  The battery life does only last for just over 2 hours for me if Im playing a intensive game like super hot or espire 1 but with the included cable that can reach quite a distance, I was never far enough away from a receptacle that I had to worry about that. The resolution and oled screens made reading text super easy and made browsing and watching videos a pleasant experience. Big screen which is a movie theater simulated experience was awesome because you just lay in bed while being a movie theater. The tracking is near perfect. I never had an issue with aiming guns or interacting with stuff, it just works Everytime. The recently implemented hand tracking is pretty neat but it's only useful for menu navigation for now.  So coming from having a really good PC vr system, I'd say this experience is on par with that of the valve index due to not having to have a wire attached to you so you're free to go wherever you want and have true vr that's portable. With oclulus link now available, you can even use it as a pc vr headset if you have that or for later down the road too!! There's almost no reason to not pick this bad boy up as it'll be the center piece of parties or gatherings or just to have at breaks at work to get everyone to try out the wonderfulness that is virtual reality!

Stop! Please read this. This is well after purchase, but it is important to know that now you need to sign in with Facebook and link it directly with your Facebook profile.Not a fan.Anyway products great screen is clear, and the addition of being able to use it on pc with a quality usb-c is great.
review_date: 2021年1月14日 在澳大利亚审核

one_reviews_text: First of all, a lot of people complain about the headset being front heavy. Yes, it’s a little bit heavier than some other VR systems, but in no way does this limit gameplay. It also doesn’t hurt your face like some reviews would make you believe, you just need to get the straps right and you’ll be good.I previously owned the PSVR, and the Quest is definitely better. Having no wires makes games twice as immersive. As far as graphics go, the Quest isn’t the best on the market but you will not find anything this good for the price. After owning both types of systems I would recommended spending the extra 100 dollars for the Quest.The system is relatively new, so the store doesn’t have a huge selection. That being said they’re are plenty of great titles on it (Beat Saber, Pistol Whip, Superhot), there are games being added almost daily.All in all, great system. May not be perfect, but in this price range it is 100% your best option.

Since amazon is now blocking me from reviewing the Quest 2, consider this a review of both Quest 1 and 2.  I was very happy with the Quest 1 for the past year and thought I'd upgrade to the Quest 2.  I've had the Quest 2 for 5 days now and cannot use it due to the horrible decision Oculus has made to FORCE A FACEBOOK account to use the device otherwise its just a paperweight.  My newly created facebook account has been disabled and I cannot even get started with it.  Oculus support can do nothing about it.  They cannot support what they require.  They tell me to contact facebook.  Facebook does nothing to resolve the issue.  Keep in mind this can happen to you at any time and you can lose everything you've purchased.  I'll be returning mine and never buying an Oculus product again

Oui, le Quest 2 est arrivé.Oui, prenez le Quest 2 (plus puissant et moins cher) et j'aurai préféré attendre quelques mois de plus si j'avais su.En attendant, le Quest 1 fonctionne très bien.Il est compatible avec le câble Link.Et en période de confinement, ça aide pour s'évader 😊
review_title: Bien mais prenez le Quest2 maintenant

one_reviews_text: The moment that the controllers reach <50% battery energy / device <30%, the controllers start desyncing and disappearing. The device sometimes doesn't remember set up guardians. Furthermore, sometimes, the device just crashes without warning. Doesn't happen often, but it's annoying when it does.Other than that, I've enjoyed it plenty.
Very good and excellent 3d.But after a long time of use eyes and chicks will get pain.It's very good to use for short times.Can't be enjoyed with whole family at a time.
review_title: Good invocation but need to increase safety

one_reviews_text: Es algo caro pero la experiencia es otra cosa, hasta el momento no he tenido problemas de mareas ni nada y la emoción es totalmente diferente el único pero que puedes encontrar es como cualquier primera generación de las tecnologías nuevas el catalogo es algo reducido pero con el tiempo este problema se ha ido solucionado

Lo malo:Hay un hueco te tamaño considerable debajo del headset una vez que te lo pones, por lo que podrían causarse problemas en cuanto a la inmersión al VR se refiere, se puede corregir ingeniándoselas para cubrir el hueco, pero no debería ser así, el headset es pesado en comparación con otros del mercado, obligatoriamente tienes que usar el celular para configurarlo por primera vez y se actualizará sin siquiera consultarlo, la tienda de Oculus Quest no dispone de muchas aplicaciones y juegos que Steam VR si tiene debido al procesador y memoria del headset, por lo que sera necesario conectar el headset a una computadora gamer para poder utilizar Steam VR y otras apps de VR, los tutoriales y configuraciones pueden llegar a ser monotonas, la creacion de avatares es muy basica y no hay mucha variedad para crear un personaje, oficialmente no hay forma de utilizar Steam VR de manera inalámbrica ya que Oculus bloqueó esta opcion de una App de terceros, se desconoce si en un futuro se implementará dicha funcionalidad de manera oficial, la aberración cromática está presente en el headset de manera leve y hay que tener especial cuidado de donde se guarda despues de ser utilizado pues es bastante delicado al polvo, humedad y luz solar.Lo bueno:Headset completamente independiente una vez configurado desde el teléfono, libertad completa de exploración y desplazamiento al no contar con cables obligatorios, buen tracking de los controles y la funcionalidad de hand tracking para usar tus manos en lugar de los controles es sorprendente, cuenta con bocinas y microfono integrado de alta calidad lo que facilita la inmersión en VR de una manera fantástica, la funcionalidad de Oculus Link permite que el headset sea reconocido por medio de cable como un Oculus Rift y así poder jugar a cualquier aplicación o juego existente en tu PC, la conectividad del headset es muy buena y es muy personalizable a nivel software, buena calidad en materiales tanto del headset como de los controladores.

Excellent casque VR à un prix modeste qui permet non seulement de jouer à des jeux VR sans fil, mais également à vos jeux SteamVR notamment ou les jeux acheté pour l'Oculus Rift S via l'Oculus Store (qui contient d'ailleurs certains jeux exclusifs) grâce à sa fonction (en bêta pour l'instant, mais efficace) qui se nomme l'Oculus Link. De plus, Oculus ont commencé à implémenter le "hand tracking", quelque chose qui n'est pas présent dans les casques concurrents à ma connaissance. Ainsi, je vous recommande l'Oculus Quest vivement!

This is a fantastic product and heaps of fun for the whole family. We were thinking of upgrading our PlayStation and decided to get this instead and we are so glad we did as it's brilliant and I wished I had brought it sooner!!You cant go wrong with getting an Oculus Quest , we use it nearly every day and its been awesome during the COVID Crisis as we have connect up and played games with our children that live in other areas.
review_date: 2020年7月16日 在澳大利亚审核

one_reviews_text: I have previously owned a Gear VR, Oculus Dk2 and CV1. I have also used a Vive. This has blown them all away.Touch controllers are in my opinion the best improvement to VR since the launch of the big consumer devices. The combination of these with a wireless complete mobile setup is revolutionary. I find myself playing this way more than I ever did with any other VR device.I got rid of my Oculus CV1 when I had a child because I didn’t have time to deal with a gaming pc, updates, cord + sensor management, etc. This has made VR gaming open for casuals.Be aware since the device only came out in May, at the time of this writing the top end game Library is small, but really all you need is beat Saber and Vader Immortal to keep you entertained for months.PS. Sideload Pavlov VR if your a shooter fan, I can’t put it down.
review_title: This is the VR device for all we have been Waiting for

one_reviews_text: este es uno de los mejores VR que hay por el momento, son de buena calidad y no cuestan tanto como los otros, no es necesario una pc para usarlo pero si se puede conectar a la pc como otros y usarlo perfectamente, lo unico malo es que no hay muchos juegos y los juegos multijugador no hay mucha gente con la que jugar

Produit simple à utilisé, la liberté offert par ce système sans fils est extraordinaire, immersif à souhait, rapport qualité/prix excellent, s'utilise tel quel mais l'on doit considéré acheter des ajouts pour le confort, tel que l'ergonomie des touch control et de la courroie pour la tête due au poids de l'écran. Il y a plusieurs vidéos sur YouTube à ce sujet. pour le reste je suis totalement satisfait de cet achat.
No complain with quality of product. It really provide extreme experience but I faced chargin issues with the product and there is no service center in india.

This is an amazing headset. Definitely worth the money. The straps could be improved but its still great even with them.The main issue is that I can't play my steam games on it. I know they are competitors but this is a big drawback. But apart from that it is amazing and really great if you have family that are not big in gaming, they can really appreciate how easy to use/set up it is.
review_title: Amazing value for your money but no steam games

one_reviews_text: Can't say enough good things about this product. While not as powerful as the headsets that connect to the PC with a cable, the fact that it is completely wireless makes up for that several times over. The convenience is just unmatched by any other VR headset. Not sure why but I always got nauseous from other headsets, and haven't had a single issue with the Oculus Quest yet with regards to motion sickness. I think all VR headsets in the future will take notes from the Oculus Quest.

Tenía un poco de duda sobre comprar uno pero es buenísimo, menos de 2 meses y ya me hizo sudar como nunca y dolores de hbros, brazos y piernas. Cómo desventaja los juegos en la Oculus store son muy caros, pero si tienen una PC que soporte la vr compren en Steam y conectenlo mediante un módem 5g, corre perfecto

C'est une très bon produit. Probablement le meilleur casque de VR. Ca donne vraiment l'impression d'être dans une autre réalité! Cest tres réel comme sensation. Les manettes sont vrm super. On voit nos mains comme si c'était réel. Mais il manque encore plusieurs types de jeux comme les jeux de course, et tout ce qui est simulation. Mais ca devrait sortir bientôt. Je trouve personnellement que ça donne mal à la tête dans certaines circonstances, lorsque l'environnement bouge autour de nous (50% du monde ont cette sensation). 4 étoiles à cause des maux de tête. Sinon j'aurais mis 5 étoiles. Et certains effets 3d font forcer les yeux et c'est fatigant à la longue. Je recommande ce casque pour ceux qui aime les sensations fortes! Ma mère à vraiment trippé, car elle n'a pas les maux de tête.

Hardware/Equipo: estéticamente es un buen producto, los materiales se perciben de buena calidad aunque algunos no son los correctos para su función, la banda de audio no esta bien ensamblada y la almohadilla absorbe el sudor, los trigers de los controles se sienten un poco frágiles y la resolución de pantalla no es lo mejor, duración de batería corta 2 hrs aprox.Software/Sistema: tiene algunos fallos frecuentes, a veces se congela, o no reconoce los controles, o falla el sistema de seguridad perimetral (guardian), a mi parecer se siente aún en desarrollo ( se han liberado actualizaciones).Catalogó de Juegos: aún limitado, han estado saliéndo nuevos (principalmente shooters), los juegos de rol son muy cortos, recomiendo descargar los que cuenten con juego en línea, los precios van de los $9 a los $34 USD la mayoría entre $19 y $30.Comodidad: de inicio es difícil lograr un buen enfoque, si lo ajustas demasiado puede doler la cabeza, algunos juegos te van a provocar nausea, te acostumbras  con el paso de los días, algunos juegos te harán sudar, en zonas cálidas mejor que cuentes con aire acondicionado como en mi caso mty.Resumen: Después de 6 semanas de uso no me arrepiento de la compra, algunos juegos son muy inmersivos y realistas, incluso algunos para ejercitarse, los gráficos no son muy pulidos pero aun así la experiencia es buena, además de juegos hay apps y canales para ver contenidos en VR, como sitios icónicos de ciudades del mundo o recorridos por las montañas, y algunas apps para conectar lap top y usar el visor para tener oficina virtual con monitores múltiples, buena opción si tienes buen espacio en casa ya que no es para uso exterior.
review_title: Producto aun con áreas de oportunidad, un básico si eres fan de videojuegos y tecnología

one_reviews_text: What's to say? This is my first experience with VR but it's been awesome especially when you have a number of steam games that support VR too. Takes a little bit of getting used to, my headset wouldn't fit quite as snug as I liked so I wore a hat backwards and that seemed to tighten things up.
review_title: Bought this along with a link cable

one_reviews_text: Unlike alot of other sets its its own self contained unit. I highly suggest getting the 16 ft cord to do Oculus link to play the other games. The quests limited pool of games on the Oculus is its downside. But with link you can play anything.

If you don't have an Oculus Quest you should seriously think about getting one. Talk about immersion! I know vr is still young, but it's more than ready for prime time. And it's worth buying just for the fun of playing Beat Saber.

My first order was cancelled by Oculus (due to out of stock I presume). So, when it was restocked, I ordered again. I was surprised at receiving the Quest earlier than expected.Need to buy games. I thought there would be more free games to entice people to use and buy.
review_title: Got the Quest earlier than expected

one_reviews_text: Muy buen juego, llego en excelentes condiciones, sin ningún problema, incluso antes de la fecha prevista. Es una excelente forma de combinar la diversión de los videojuegos con la actividad física. Llevo años sin jugar video juegos, pero este ha sido una grata sorpresa porque de verdad sientes estar dentro del juego.

If you are undecided about buying this, don't be. The future is today. Next level in the video game experience and immersion. I do recommebd buying after market accessories to improve on the comfortably when wearing this unit. Some flaws with the design for me. I have purchased a silicone cover for the face foam. Makes wearing it for longer sessions more comfortable. So what are you waiting 4? Click the buy now button!

Love the quest, but lately, it often loses head tracking.This quest is not old enough for the problem it has, and I know a lot of others with same problems.While in a game, it loses track of the guardian. So itbgetscblack untill it can see it again and go back in the game.And yes, the room  is well lit.Battery is now also  caping at 95 %

First I wanna add that I did have issues with my device but Amazon has amazing customer service and took care of me and now I have a replacement on the way.WOW, I used to say to people who asked me about VR before that I couldn't see monitor gaming being replaced but to be honest VR is its own thing that isn't meant as a replacement to flat gaming but it is meant as a way more immersive platform.I had a couple of moments where I was in the middle of a multiplayer match and I was just staring at things like my hands and gun thinking to myself how real it felt, how out of all the games I've been playing my entire life VR is the only one to do what I've been wanting to do since I first played games and that is actually be inside the game.If you are on the fence and can afford this pull the trigger because if your on the fence you will 100% not be disappointed what so ever.

Cordless VR is amazing, and apps like Virtual Desktop allow you to connect it like a PC-connected headset wirelessly as well. Good games such as Beat Saber, SUPERHOT VR and Tetris Effect, and sideloading games greatly enhances the library. Would recommend for a first look into VR, and for people with low performance PCs or no PC at all.
review_date: 2020年7月17日 在澳大利亚审核

one_reviews_text: Works good. Nothing wrong with the software or the hardware. Needs more of a selection for games and apps. I found it difficult to find replacement lenses. I would suggest get a lens protector as to not scratch the lens from your glasses. Even using the spacer my niece still managed to scratch the lens with her glasses. Worth the money for sure though.

I had tried the Oculus Rift with my PC a while ago and was put off by the low resolution and screen door effect. I am used to gaming at 4K with life like graphics and so was expecting more improvement in the resolution, but its still not there yet. The Quest being fully wireless, and supporting 6 degrees of freedom is a great VR experience otherwise. The controllers are great too and its almost possible to believe you can use both hands in the VR world. But I just can't overlook the grainy visuals.
review_title: Great, immersive VR, but resolution still is quite low

one_reviews_text: The absolute BEST VR for gaming on the market! Can be used All-in-one or wired to a gaming rig. Makes the Rift S obsolete! It's fun to use, easy to setup and good battery/storage. After a while though it can create aches on the front and back of you head as it's quite weighted ( because of the inner components) mandatory 45-1hr playtimes as it can be painful after a while.

Ok so with this vr headset it's really good ive been playing for awhile now and i can say it's worth it to buy but with a few things i would keep in mindPros:1. Cordless experience2. No pc required3. has a lot of games to get right intoCons:1. Only 2 hours of battery life2. It's heavy on your headSo it's pretty good had all the things i wanted out of a vr experience:)

This is a great VR set. Very easy to setup and get going. There are no wires to connect to a PC or a game console, but you need a smart phone. Comes with fun utilities, demos etc. that are just fun by themselves. The fit is not perfect, but that's not enough inconvenience to go down to 4 stars. For context, I am not a VR pro but have tried many others in the past. This seems to be the best value for anyone wanting to get in to VR at this time.

Tengo un HTC Vive, un RIFT S y he probado el Vive Pro, el Oculus Quest es el mejor hasta el momento, para jugar juegos de PC sólo necesitas un cable USB tipo C de alta velocidad o comprar la app de Virtual Desktop y es idéntico a un RIFT-S pero inalámbrico. No me he visto en la necesidad de más espacio por lo que el de 64 gb es perfecto para mi.
review_title: El mejor casco de VR hasta el momento

one_reviews_text: Product arrived quickly, however, the unit was quite obviously pre used. Box lid had tape tear marks that didnt match the lid. Cords were all unwound and battery was dead. Missing a manual. Had dirty fingerprints all over it. I paid full price for new, not used. This is b.s.

Imprecionado con la calidad de materiales y fabricación, por dar un ejemplo los mandos se sienten como el mando xbox one élite, simplemente de alta calidad. Su función de realidad virtual la cumple a la perfección, este es el futuro de la realidad virtual, o al menos yo apostaría por este camino de los standalone, cualquiera que tenga en mente adquirir este equipo hágalo no se arrepentirá, único punto negativo es que los juegos son algo caros pero no para alarmarse.
review_title: El futuro de la realidad virtual

one_reviews_text: Es súper cómodo poder encender y ponerte a jugar rápidamente sin conectar nada.Muy divertido. La calidad del hardware es buena, aunque tampoco perfecta, pero se siente resistente.Los juegos son buenos, hay varias experiencias gratuitas también. La tienda ahora 2019 es algo limitada y tiene pocas ofertas, los precios sobre 10 y 30 usd, pero son buenos y divertidos.Con Oculus Link ya podrás jugar juegos de Rift y de PC.Puntos en contra es que a veces se siente algo pesado después de un tiempo, y hay que apretarlo mucho. Y la pila le dura unas 2hrs y media de juego continuas.
This is an amazing product, easy to use, lots of fun and well made. There is a large choice of games for free or between $14-$50 which is cheap compared to 2D games on other platforms
review_date: 2019年9月2日 在澳大利亚审核

one_reviews_text: Muy buena compra no me arrepiento, se que puede ser algo caro pero si quieres meterte a los juegos de realidad virtual esta Occulus ayuda mucho por ser independiente de la computadora. Unico malo es que pesa mucho y puede llegar a ser algo molesto jugar por mucho tiempo, pero es algo que con accesorios se arregla.

Not having a PC powerful enough to get into VR I thought I'd never be able to try it. But this VR headset being complete standalone changed everything. Some cons with this device is the low battery life and being extremely front heavy. You would not be comfortable wearing this for more than an hour without balancing it out with something on the back. Luckily there are solutions to this like adding a head-strap or attaching a power bank to the back to extend battery life and reduce the front pressure.
review_title: The Best VR Headset to Get Right Now

one_reviews_text: Purchased for the family and the kids love it. Lucked out and received the 3 Vader Immortals for free which was the icing on top. Games are reasonably priced and the kids are addicted to Superhot VR. Easy to set up and Oculus link makes it even better if you decide you want to get better quality and more games by hooking up to a PC. Side loading is also pretty easy to do and adds some extra options.
review_title: Awesome device and only getting better

one_reviews_text: Es el primer visor de VR qué tengo, y estoy más que contento con el. Vale cada centavo y aunque no hay tantos títulos disponibles en este momento, los que hay son muy buenos. Excepto el de Vader...
A lot of funUnforgettable experiencesHoweverMotion sickness issuesGraphics aren’t that good, if you look really hard you can see pixelsThe headset is very heavyUncomfortable after 20-30 mins

Amazing system! Great for gaming and fitness. Graphics are much better than expected considering it's an all in one system. Also doubles as the Rift meaning you can plug it in to the right computer and play the better graphics games like Fallout and Skyrim.

Love this headset. Picked this unit up for work to use for VR presentations. Building relationships through VR is something we should all try.Oculuslink cable works well also (make sure you get a good one)

Lo que más me ha sorprendido del oculus quest, es que me está ayudando a bajar de peso! llevo más de 10 kilos desde que lo compré. Es divertido, y para estos tiempos de pandemia. Es lo mejor que me pudo haber pasado en la vida.

I've only owned the PS4 VR and the Oculus Quest blows it out of the water! The graphics and realism is unrivaled. Hopefully updates in the future will help with the ever dreaded screen door effect in all VR systems, but this one seems less noticable but still obvious.

Got this for my kids to use... HUGE problem with user accounts. You can only have one user account active unless you reset the quest. Practically this means you are unable to have multiple people use the quest without interfering with the progress of other users’ games.No idea why Oculus would put a limitation like this on the quest.Happy to amend review if this issue is fixed.

The unit I received was packed in 2019 (3-ish years old when I bought it). The batteries for the controllers were expired, and acid leaked on the box; no damage occurred to any of the other components.
review_date: 2021年9月3日 在澳大利亚审核

one_reviews_text: The Oculus Quest is a great headset, and the freedom you get with it is reason enough to buy it alone!Oculus Link proved to me that PC VR is tedious and annoying. It's much nicer to just pop on the headset, click a game, and get going, without dealing with USB issues or game launch issues or SteamVR issues.One thing I'd like to see improved however is casting. It'd be nice if we were able to cast to PC for doing Twitch streams etc.
LOVE my oculus quest!! Its pretty neat. You can do so many different things and it looks so real. The shipping was very fast and for the price, it is definatly worth it
Bought this for my fiancé’s birthday and he loves it! My family played it and fell in love so bought one for themselves as well! Very user-friendly and the guardian feature is a lifesaver!!

Not sure if it's just my unit or its a product issue, but there is absolutely no way for the screen to be fully clean. There's always some oil slick halo left. I also see focusing issues on the edges of the lens, so peripheral vision is blurred.
Je l'utilise pour me divertir à  la maison.Bon produit. Seulement un oeu decu car non recu dans  sa boite originale, sans papier d'instruction et usage alors que je le.croyais neuf. Mais marche bien.
review_title: Recu usagé alors que je le croyais jeuf. Mais fonctionne bien.

one_reviews_text: La primera imprecion es bastate buena, solo faltan mas titulos triple A en el ecosistema de oculus.Las puedes usar con una pc, pero requiere ser muy potente, con tarjeta grafica gama media.

C'est un des meilleurs casques faisant partie du marché. Pas besoin de PC pour pouvoir tourner de vrais jeux en réalité virtuelle, contrairement à l'Oculus Go qui vise plutôt les application Médias (regarder des vidéos). Par contre, il n'est pas très confortable pour de longue sessions de jeu et la batterie ne dure pas très longtemps, et le mécanisme de vibration de ma manette gauche est un peu plus bruyant que la normal, expliquant le 4 étoiles. Je le recommande pour tout publique.
Slightly Overpriced because of import duty in India.But good to have this kind of product in bucket.

Wireless, great games so far. Since I have I this headset, I rarely use my Windows Mixed Reality VR headset on my PC.I am using Virtual Desktop app on the Quest + my PC VR games. Almost perfect! And no wires!The batteries lasts 2 hours.. only a small downside. The batteries on the controllers lasts a while. Compared to my WMR controllers. Recommend this. Great gift for Christmas.
review_title: This is an amazing VR headset

one_reviews_text: I was constantly waiting for a jumping on point for VR and this is exactly that. It gives a fully immersive VR experience despite any graphical sacrifices due to the 6DOF and Hand Presence. those two factors are WAY more important than graphics for immersion. 64GB is also way more than necessary right now. The only gripes I have are that there's no cloud saving yet and there are tiny spots of static that pop up randomly but they're jut annoyances at most.
First VR set and so far works well.  Not a whole lot of options on default oculus software/store as of yet but with recent firmware upgrade to allow linking to PC it's opened up a whole lot more now.
review_title: A bit of a splurge but fun

one_reviews_text: I get defective product. I have dead green pixel on my left screenUnfortunately it took the fright forward 5 weeks to deliver it and i missed the rplacement window

Love it 👍, use it for games and YouTube, Netflix, most fun games is Dead and Buried, you can chat and clap a High Five with people, much better than any other VR Chat so far and the multiplayer game is cool, I spend few hours a day in this games with my friends 👍😛

one_reviews_text: Enjoy the time with the product. Oculus Link is a great addition to the product.enjoying Steam and Oculus games.

one_reviews_text: Until user profiles allow families to share this amazing VR headset, I cannot recommend the Quest. Demo's to guests, or allowing families to play the same game at different save points are necessary baseline features.

Excelente visor de RV, tengo también la PSVR que me gusta mucho pero el no tener cables sí hace diferencia. Los controles son muy buenos y la experiencia de 6dof es perfecta. Lo recomiendo ampliamente.

Easy to setup and use, and no need for a beefy computer. Works good too :) Having an immersive experience and then taking this off just to realize how small it actually is will never get old

They don't advertise it very well but the quest can do exactly what Rift S can do via virtual desktop. If you're looking to get a VR head set I would highly recommend this as even after getting accessories for it, it's still cheaper than buying a Rift S from the people taking advantage of short supply.

Bought the headset in August but just got a chance to play around. When I turned on the headset, there was no setup tutorial. And the device was still linked to the old owner's e-mail address. I feel so disappointed that Oculus is fooling customers by selling refurbished products as new.
review_title: Paid Full Price for a Used Device

one_reviews_text: Lo.amo, es el pinshisss futuro, comodidad, versatilidad, despues de jugar  en VR nada volverá  a ser igual, con las nuevas actualizaciones y mas aun el oculus link conetado al pc con esos graficos pfff.

one_reviews_text: Disapointed that shortly after I purchased this it was discontinued and a newer, better, cheaper version (Quest 2) was released.

My 11 year old  son bought this for himself but the whole family is enjoying it. It would be nice to have multiplayer options but quality of video and sound are excellent. Overall a big hit around here! Very nice to not be attached to a cord and does not require a huge space to play in. My son says, “it is surreal”.

I love it I had it for 2 weeks now and I love it i like playing beat saber with customSongs on it I love Watching movies on itOne thing I hate is the tracking turns off in the dark but it’s still a good vr

one_reviews_text: It was not clear this was an opened product when I bought it at full price. The box was opened and ripped, the controllers had been used, and an account was already set up. The Oculus itself had dirty fingerprints on the lenses.  2 stars only because of the fact it was an opened product, the Quest itself rocks.
review_title: Box was previously opened and Quest had to be re-set

one_reviews_text: Al no tener un PC Gamer me veía limitado a no poder jugar VR, sin embargo, Oculus Quest ofrece poder experimenta la realidad virtual sin necesidad de tener una PC Gamer.

The quest is a home run for VR. In 10 seconds you can play beat saber anywhere. Tracking works well as long as the controllers are infront of you.I have a wireless vive and a Pimax and now the Oculus Quest takes most of vr time. No fiddling with cables, trackers or software.

Oculus quest is myy first VR headset. I was struggling to find the best headset for me. However after they announced oculus link I was amazed. Now you can plug in your quest to your pc and make it a pcvr headset too and it works very well. If you have a high end or average laptop/pc but also want a standalone headset, go for the Quest.

The absolute best mobile VR headset. Easy to set up. I love using it on long flights for watching movies. Not as graphically powerful as a full PC based headset, bit I'm completely blown away by how good it is! I still can't believe this thing exists, especially for its price.
Amazing piece of technology that's only going to get better in the next year!  Very happy with this.

I know, there are some games made for oculus exclusive, but its not that entertaining. So unless ur not a serious gamer and dont get board easily, they the valve would be better. Great product, only problem I have and not sure if possible, but could not transfer games purchased from rift to the quest (2 different models). Probably the coolest purchase I have made in a very long time.  This is the kickoff product for where all VR experiences should be heading. Love that it's portable and does not need wires unless the battery dies.
